address.description: Address to handle client requests (kv, cop, etc.)

last_heartbeat.description: The last heartbeat timestamp of the store.

peer_address.description:
Address to handle peer requests (raft messages from other store).
Empty means same as address.

start_timestamp.description: The start timestamp of the current store

status_address.description: Status address provides the HTTP service for external components

auto-compaction-mode.description: AutoCompactionMode is either 'periodic' or 'revision'. The default value is 'periodic'.

auto-compaction-retention-v2.description:
AutoCompactionRetention is either duration string with time unit
(e.g. '5m' for 5-minute), or revision unit (e.g. '5000').
If no time unit is provided and compaction mode is 'periodic',
the unit defaults to hour. For example, '5' translates into 5-hour.
The default retention is 1 hour.
Before etcd v3.3.x, the type of retention is int. We add 'v2' suffix to make it backward compatible.

electionInterval.description: ElectionInterval is the interval for etcd Raft election.

join.description: Join to an existing pd cluster, a string of endpoints.

lease.description:
LeaderLease time, if leader doesn't update its TTL
in etcd after lease time, etcd will expire the leader key
and other servers can campaign the leader again.
Etcd only supports seconds TTL, so here is second too.

preVote.description:
Prevote is true to enable Raft Pre-Vote.
If enabled, Raft runs an additional election phase
to check whether it would get enough votes to win
an election, thus minimizing disruptions.

quota-backend-bytes.description:
QuotaBackendBytes Raise alarms when backend size exceeds the given quota. 0 means use the default quota.
the default size is 2GB, the maximum is 8GB.

tickInterval.description: TickInterval is the interval for etcd Raft tick.

tso-save-interval.description: TsoSaveInterval is the interval to save timestamp.

key-type.description:
KeyType is option to specify the type of keys.
There are some types supported: ["table", "raw", "txn"], default: "table"

max-reset-ts-gap.description: MaxResetTSGap is the max gap to reset the tso.

metric-storage.description:
MetricStorage is the cluster metric storage.
Currently we use prometheus as metric storage, we may use PD/TiKV as metric storage later.

runtime-services.description: RuntimeServices is the running the running extension services.

use-region-storage.description: UseRegionStorage enables the independent region storage.

enable-placement-rules.description: When PlacementRules feature is enabled. MaxReplicas and LocationLabels are not uesd any more.

location-labels.description:
The label keys specified the location of a store.
The placement priorities is implied by the order of label keys.
For example, ["zone", "rack"] means that we should place replicas to
different zones first, then to different racks if we don't have enough zones.

max-replicas.description: MaxReplicas is the number of replicas for each region.

strictly-match-label.description: StrictlyMatchLabel strictly checks if the label of TiKV is matched with LocationLabels.

disable-location-replacement.description:
DisableLocationReplacement is the option to prevent replica checker from
moving replica to a better location.
WARN: DisableLocationReplacement is deprecated.

disable-make-up-replica.description:
DisableMakeUpReplica is the option to prevent replica checker from making up
replicas when replica count is less than expected.
WARN: DisableMakeUpReplica is deprecated.

disable-raft-learner.description:
WARN: DisableLearner is deprecated.
DisableLearner is the option to disable using AddLearnerNode instead of AddNode.

disable-remove-down-replica.description:
DisableRemoveDownReplica is the option to prevent replica checker from
removing down replicas.
WARN: DisableRemoveDownReplica is deprecated.

disable-remove-extra-replica.description:
DisableRemoveExtraReplica is the option to prevent replica checker from
removing extra replicas.
WARN: DisableRemoveExtraReplica is deprecated.

disable-replace-offline-replica.description:
DisableReplaceOfflineReplica is the option to prevent replica checker from
replacing offline replicas.
WARN: DisableReplaceOfflineReplica is deprecated.

enable-cross-table-merge.description:
EnableCrossTableMerge is the option to enable cross table merge. This means two Regions can be merged with different table IDs.
This option only works when key type is "table".

enable-debug-metrics.description: EnableDebugMetrics is the option to enable debug metrics.

enable-location-replacement.description: EnableLocationReplacement is the option to enable replica checker to move replica to a better location.

enable-make-up-replica.description: EnableMakeUpReplica is the option to enable replica checker to make up replica.

enable-one-way-merge.description: EnableOneWayMerge is the option to enable one way merge. This means a Region can only be merged into the next region of it.

enable-remove-down-replica.description: EnableRemoveDownReplica is the option to enable replica checker to remove down replica.

enable-remove-extra-replica.description: EnableRemoveExtraReplica is the option to enable replica checker to remove extra replica.

enable-replace-offline-replica.description: EnableReplaceOfflineReplica is the option to enable replica checker to replace offline replica.

high-space-ratio.description:
HighSpaceRatio is the highest usage ratio of store which regraded as high space.
High space means there is a lot of spare capacity, and store region score varies directly with used size.

hot-region-cache-hits-threshold.description:
HotRegionCacheHitThreshold is the cache hits threshold of the hot region.
If the number of times a region hits the hot cache is greater than this
threshold, it is considered a hot region.

hot-region-schedule-limit.description: HotRegionScheduleLimit is the max coexist hot region schedules.

leader-schedule-limit.description: LeaderScheduleLimit is the max coexist leader schedules.

leader-schedule-policy.description: LeaderSchedulePolicy is the option to balance leader, there are some policies supported: ["count", "size"], default: "count"

low-space-ratio.description:
high space stage         transition stage           low space stage
  |--------------------|-----------------------------|-------------------------|
  ^                    ^                             ^                         ^
  0       HighSpaceRatio * capacity       LowSpaceRatio * capacity          capacity

LowSpaceRatio is the lowest usage ratio of store which regraded as low space.
When in low space, store region score increases to very large and varies inversely with available size.

max-merge-region-size.description:
If both the size of region is smaller than MaxMergeRegionSize
and the number of rows in region is smaller than MaxMergeRegionKeys,
it will try to merge with adjacent regions.

max-snapshot-count.description:
If the snapshot count of one store is greater than this value,
it will never be used as a source or target store.

max-store-down-time.description:
MaxStoreDownTime is the max duration after which
a store will be considered to be down if it hasn't reported heartbeats.

merge-schedule-limit.description: MergeScheduleLimit is the max coexist merge schedules.

patrol-region-interval.description: PatrolRegionInterval is the interval for scanning region during patrol.

region-schedule-limit.description: RegionScheduleLimit is the max coexist region schedules.

replica-schedule-limit.description: ReplicaScheduleLimit is the max coexist replica schedules.

scheduler-max-waiting-operator.description: SchedulerMaxWaitingOperator is the max coexist operators for each scheduler.

schedulers-v2.description: Schedulers support for loading customized schedulers

split-merge-interval.description: SplitMergeInterval is the minimum interval time to permit merge after split.

store-balance-rate.description: StoreBalanceRate is the maximum of balance rate for each store.

store-limit-mode.description:
StoreLimitMode can be auto or manual, when set to auto,
PD tries to change the store limit values according to
the load state of the cluster dynamically. User can
overwrite the auto-tuned value by pd-ctl, when the value
is overwritten, the value is fixed until it is deleted.
Default: manual

tolerant-size-ratio.description: TolerantSizeRatio is the ratio of buffer size for balance scheduler.

cacert-path.description: CAPath is the path of file that contains list of trusted SSL CAs. if set, following four settings shouldn't be empty

cert-allowed-cn.description: CertAllowedCN is a CN which must be provided by a client

cert-path.description: CertPath is the path of file that contains X509 certificate in PEM format.

key-path.description: KeyPath is the path of file that contains X509 key in PEM format.

development.description:
Development puts the logger in development mode, which changes the
behavior of DPanicLevel and takes stacktraces more liberally.

disable-caller.description:
DisableCaller stops annotating logs with the calling function's file
name and line number. By default, all logs are annotated.

disable-error-verbose.description:
DisableErrorVerbose stops annotating logs with the full verbose error
message.

disable-stacktrace.description:
DisableStacktrace completely disables automatic stacktrace capturing. By
default, stacktraces are captured for WarnLevel and above logs in
development and ErrorLevel and above in production.

format.description: Log format. one of json, text, or console.

sampling.description:
SamplingConfig sets a sampling strategy for the logger. Sampling caps the
global CPU and I/O load that logging puts on your process while attempting
to preserve a representative subset of your logs.

Values configured here are per-second. See zapcore.NewSampler for details.

filename.description: Log filename, leave empty to disable file log.

max-backups.description: Maximum number of old log files to retain.

max-days.description: Max log keep days, default is never deleting.

max-size.description: Max size for a single file, in MB.

max_peer_count.description:
max peer count for a region.
pd will do the auto-balance if region peer count mismatches.

conf_ver.description: Conf change version, auto increment when add or remove peer

version.description: Region version, auto increment when split or merge

reachTimes.description: Time when reach the current status

member_id.description: member_id is the unique id of the PD member.

name.description: name is the name of the PD member.

cluster_id.description: cluster_id is the ID of the cluster which sent the response.

annotations.description: used by cobra.Command bash autocomple code

changed.description: If the user set the value (or if left to default)

defValue.description: default value (as text); for usage message

deprecated.description: If this flag is deprecated, this string is the new or now thing to use

hidden.description: used by cobra.Command to allow flags to be hidden from help/usage text

name.description: name as it appears on command line

noOptDefVal.description: default value (as text); if the flag is on the command line without any options

shorthandDeprecated.description: If the shorthand of this flag is deprecated, this string is the new or now thing to use

argsLenAtDash.description: len(args) when a '--' was located when parsing, or -1 if no --

output.description: nil means stderr; use out() accessor

parseErrorsWhitelist.description: ParseErrorsWhitelist is used to configure a whitelist of errors

sortFlags.description:
SortFlags is used to indicate, if user wants to have sorted flags in
help/usage messages.

unknownFlags.description: UnknownFlags will ignore unknown flags errors and continue parsing rest of the flags

end_key.description: hex format end key, for marshal/unmarshal

group_id.description: mark the source that add the rule

index.description: rule apply order in a group, rule with less ID is applied first when indexes are equal

label_constraints.description: used to select stores to place peers

location_labels.description: used to make peers isolated physically

override.description: when it is true, all rules with less indexes are disabled

start_key.description: hex format start key, for marshal/unmarshal

anti_count.description: AntiCount used to eliminate some noise when remove region in cache

hot_degree.description: HotDegree records the hot region update times

last_update_time.description: LastUpdateTime used to calculate average write

rollingByteRate.description: rolling statistics, recording some recently added records.

version.description: Version used to check the region split times
